summary:
This is a basic mod. It only changes the following for smelting:
1). You can smelt in 5 different amounts per ore; 1, 5, 10, 20, and 40 units.
2). You will earn experience in smithing when you use the smelter.
3) Iron is repaired to use the same recipe as the other ingots. (2 to smelt 1)

The reason:
I got tired
